title: GDG DevFest Hyderabad 2016 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest Hyderabad 2016 was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in Hyderabad!

title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: Google Developers Group Hyderabad is proud to announce the sixth annual GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in Hyderabad carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **4 November** at **Google Hyderabad**.

title: Call for Papers - DevFest 2017
brief: GDG DevFest Hyderabad 2017 is announced! The 6th edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Hyderabad will take on **4 November , 2017**. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://goo.gl/KoHXXh).

title: Inviting Startups & Developer Ninjas
brief: GDG Hyderabad is inviting applications from local startups and developer ninjas to participate at the DevFest 2017 on 4th November 2017. The idea is to connect right developers with startups that enable day to day business operations...

title: Inviting Community Partners
brief: Google Developers Group Hyderabad welcomes all the local developer communities of the city to partner with us for our annual global event - DevFest 2017.With a common aim to forge the essence of open innovation and to build a strong developers community, we seek your help in reaching out...
